about.text1: In a landscape defined by excess and duplicates, MODON Evolutio offers a groundbreaking standard of qualified insight and seamless experience that sets a new benchmark in international real estate. Clients navigating high-end acquisitions deserve to be guided with insight, attention, and a personal property advisor who knows their market and advocates with intent.
about.text2: Through a peer-to-peer network of boutique brokers and independent, personal advisors, MODON Evolutio delivers tailored access to prime real estate across the most refined markets and beyond. This is where service and expertise return to their rightful form: precise, personal, and built entirely around you.

bespoke.text: Your representation is defined by expertise, independence, and a personal approach that reflects what matters most to you. From inquiring to signing and well beyond the transfer of ownership, you are supported and guided at every stage. Every detail is handled with precision and attention; delivered as a bespoke standard of service that ensures your interests are represented at every step.

list: One trusted contact focused solely on your interests
Direct access to exclusive off-market listings
A private search with no unwanted registrations
A streamlined, and safe path to your new home

guide.title: Buying abroad? Avoid common pitfalls.
guide.subtitle: Before you continue your property search, see what every buyer learns too late.
guide.text1: Every year, we see international buyers fall into the same traps. They spend weeks. They waste far too much time chasing duplicate listings, only to discover the properties are outdated or no longer available. They are registered as "clients" with agencies they never agreed to. Without realizing it, they end up listed as "registered clients" with multiple agencies. And too often, they rely on seller's brokers who claim to serve both sides, a setup that rarely protects the buyer's interests.
guide.text2: These are avoidable mistakes, but only if you know where to look. In this short video, we share the three most common pitfalls that turn a dream search into a frustrating experience, and we show you how to approach the international market with clarity, confidence and the right support.

our_company.hero_subtitle: Personal property advisors for discerning clients worldwide
our_company.intro_text_1: At MODON Evolutio, we believe that buying or selling a luxury property should be a seamless, rewarding experience. Since our founding, we've built our reputation on providing personalized service, expert guidance, and unparalleled market knowledge.
our_company.intro_text_2: Our approach combines the intimacy of a boutique advisory with the reach of a global network. We work exclusively with clients who value discretion, expertise, and results over volume.

client_first.title: Client-First Approach
client_first.description: Every decision we make is guided by our clients' best interests.

global_perspective.title: Global Perspective

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Uncompromising standards in service, marketing, and results.

trust_integrity.title: Trust & Integrity
trust_integrity.description: Transparent relationships built on honesty and discretion.

our_company.quote: "Our mission is simple: to provide each client with the insight, access, and expertise needed to make their property dreams a reality."

team_cta.title: Meet Our Team
team_cta.text: Our advisors bring decades of combined experience in luxury real estate

management_team.hero_subtitle: Meet the experts behind MODON Evolutio's success

members.name: Alexander van der Berg
members.bio: Over 20 years of experience in international luxury real estate. Alexander founded MODON Evolutio with a vision to redefine property advisory services.

members.name: Sofia Martinez
members.bio: Leading our global sales team, Sofia brings expertise from luxury hospitality and high-end property transactions across Europe.

members.name: James Chen
members.bio: James oversees our expansion into Asia-Pacific and Middle Eastern markets, connecting global buyers with European properties.

members.name: Emma Johansson
members.bio: Emma leads our digital and traditional marketing initiatives, ensuring every property receives premium positioning.

members.name: Marco Rossi
members.bio: Specializing in Mediterranean properties, Marco has closed over €500M in transactions across Italy, Spain, and Croatia.

members.name: Isabella Laurent
members.bio: Isabella ensures every client receives the personalized attention that defines the MODON Evolutio experience.

investors.hero_subtitle: An intelligent ecosystem connecting prime developers, high-net-worth buyers, and expert advisors.
investors.problem_text: The luxury market in Egypt is fragmented, plagued by stale listings, and lacks a unified digital standard that meets international expectations.
investors.solution_text: We provide a high-tech layer that curates only the best, provides real-time data transparency, and automates the luxury transaction journey through AI-driven insights.
investors.market_cap: Egypt's luxury real estate market is projected to grow by 15% annually, driven by new massive urban developments and rising international demand.
